Class SettingMenuTest

java.lang.Object
Menus.SettingMenuTest
public class SettingMenuTest extends Object
Unit tests for the SettingMenu class.

This class verifies the functionality of the SettingMenu, including singleton behavior, UI component creation, and configuration of settings such as volume and difficulty.

The tests ensure that the `SettingMenu` behaves as expected and validates the integration of its components, such as sliders, buttons, and settings configuration.

Source Code: GitHub Link

  • Field Details

      The SettingMenu instance being tested.

    • root

  • Constructor Details

    • SettingMenuTest

      public SettingMenuTest()

  • Method Details

    • setupJavaFX

      public static void setupJavaFX()
      Ensures that the JavaFX platform is initialized before running tests.

      This is necessary for testing JavaFX components in the SettingMenu.

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      Sets up the test environment before each test.

      Initializes the root Group and the singleton instance of SettingMenu.

    • testGetSettingMenu

      public void testGetSettingMenu()
      Verifies the singleton pattern for the SettingMenu.

      Ensures that multiple calls to SettingMenu.GetSettingMenu(Group) return the same instance.

    • testConfigureSettings

      public void testConfigureSettings()
      Tests the `configureSettings` method.

      Verifies that the settings UI is properly configured and the stack pane contains the expected components: a MenuImage and a GridPane.

    • testCreateVolumeSlider

      public void testCreateVolumeSlider()
      Tests the creation of the volume slider.

      Verifies that the slider is initialized with the correct range and default value.

    • testCreateDifficultySlider

      public void testCreateDifficultySlider()
      Tests the creation of the difficulty slider.

      Verifies that the slider is initialized with the correct range and default value.

    • testCreateBackButton

      public void testCreateBackButton()
      Tests the creation of the back button.

      Verifies that the button is properly styled and has a graphic assigned.

    • testGoBack

      public void testGoBack()
      Tests the `goBack` method.

      Verifies that the stack pane is cleared when the user navigates back.

    • testSetDifficulty

      public void testSetDifficulty()
      Tests setting the difficulty via the difficulty slider.

      Verifies that changing the slider value updates the difficulty setting in the SettingMenu.

    • testSetVolume

      public void testSetVolume()
      Tests setting the volume via the volume slider.

      Verifies that changing the slider value updates the volume in SoundEffects.
